law.catch_line: An individual is a covered employee if the individual regularly distributes or sells newspapers:...

text.section:
An individual is a covered employee if the individual regularly distributes or sells newspapers:
on the street; or
to customers at their homes or places of business.

For the purposes of this title, the employer of an individual who is a covered employee under this section is:
each independent news agency for which the covered employee sells newspapers; and
each publisher who engages the covered employee to distribute or sell its newspapers.
